scripts.codegen:schema: npx ts-json-schema-generator --path 'src/action.ts' --type Root --out build/schema.json --additional-properties false --expose all --unstable
scripts.test: pnpm run test:ts && pnpm run test:wasm
scripts.build: pnpm run build:wasm && pnpm run build:ts
scripts.build:wasm: asc assembly/index.ts -o build/test.wasm -t build/test.wat --debug --runtime stub --exportRuntime --bindings raw --disableWarning 235
